name: Valera Satsura
what_you_do: Custom software development company specializing in web and mobile development for early stage startup companies.
business_focus: Web and mobile development for early stage startup companies across legaltech, fintech, martech and web development platforms.
who_you_serve: Startup to commercial customers from all over the world, working in domains such as legaltech, fintech, martech and web development platforms.
bio: Valery Satsura is a technical leader and entrepreneur, serving as Founder of Start Matter, a custom software development company founded in 2014. He is also currently Technical Lead at Xperiencify since October 2019, and founder of QWEECO. He holds a Master of Science degree from Gomel State University, graduated in 2010.
service_provided: Custom software development, web development, mobile development
